jobDescription: We are currently seeking a Business Intelligence Analyst to join our Data Science team.At ActiveCampaign the Business Intelligence Analyst will be responsible for building data visualizations that help our team answer tough questions. Our team is passionate about leveraging value from this data for end users. We use this data to predict deal closures, predict best email send schedules, predictively suggest best email content, marketing automation and much more.If this sounds like you and your next career move, then we would love to hear from you.What your day could consist of: Building visualizations related to finance, sales, product and customer support data for dashboards and reportsInterfacing with team members to understand reporting requirements and data needsSharing knowledge around data tools throughout the companyBrainstorm with the data science team and suggest data solutions for the data warehouseParticipating in data exploration, and providing analytical insightsOwning the validation, clean up and governance of dataActing as an internal consultant, using analytical skills to answer critical business questionsBeing a steward of the data warehouse (e.g. documentation, maintenance, and knowledge sharing)What is needed:
